product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Endurance Air Sleeping Pad - Regular - Special Buy
long_description: Get a good night's rest while backpacking with the ALPS Mountaineering Endurance Air Sleeping Pad. It features an anti-slip ALPS logo on the top to help keep your sleeping bag from sliding around.
